name: Havest Exchange
description: Made for Gardeners, by a gardener. Harvest Exchange facilitates the need for trade, buying, selling, and sharing of produce in local communities.

name: Perfect Lips
description: A full-stack MERN (Mongoose, Express, React, Node) app that reviews lipstick products and displays them.

name: Fitness
description: A full-stack MERN (Mongoose, Express, React, Node) app that stores users' fitness selfies and profiles

name: Rick and Morty Wiki
description: A responsive (Javascript, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, HTML, CSS) wiki page about characters in Rick and Morty.
